note.p: Education: Trinity College, Cambridge (admitted 1655); Inner Temple (admitted 1655)
Career: Left Cambridge when he inherited Danny (1657); pupil and later friend and correspondent of John Ray (FRS 1667); Ironmaster
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Venn; Raven
References: Susan McMahon, 'John Ray (1627-1705) and the Act of Uniformity 1662' in NR 2000 vol 54 pp 153-178
Notes: Proposed by John Wilkins; expelled (1685)
